articles.description: Crown Prince Frederik of Denmark, 52, got the jab on Tuesday, the same day Prince William had his jab, and shared a snap on the royal court's official Instagram page, to drive vaccination efforts.
articles.content:
The heirs to the throne in both Denmark and the UK have revealed they received their first doses of the Covid-19 vaccine on the same day.  
Crown Prince Frederik of Denmark, 52, got the jab on Tuesd… [+3467 chars]
